name: America Is Becoming Steadily Less Religious

content.html: As a believer with a skeptical and logical mind, a passion for understanding our world through science, and a strong commitment to equality and human rights, I can completely understand the decline of traditional religious institutions. In fact, in many ways, I am happy for it. I find the global Christian church's positions on creation and science, climate change, LGBTQ rights, and social justice to be so far removed from Jesus that it frustrates and saddens me. Burn it down so that it can be built back up in the true image of Jesus – a global movement to advocate for human rights, social justice, the protection and restoration of our planet, all for the glory of God.
